Class AbstractResponseCallback

java.lang.Object
  me.normanmaurer.niosmtp.delivery.callback.AbstractResponseCallback
All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractAuthResponseCallback, AbstractPipelineResponseCallback, EhloResponseCallback, LMTPPostDataResponseCallback, LMTPWelcomeResponseCallback, PostDataResponseCallback, StartTlsResponseCallback, WelcomeResponseCallback
public abstract class AbstractResponseCallback
extends Object
implements SMTPResponseCallback, SMTPDeliverySessionConstants, SMTPClientConstants

Abstract base implementation of SMTPResponseCallback which comple the SMTPDeliveryFuture on an Exception

Author:
Norman Maurer

onException

public void onException(SMTPClientSession session,
                        Throwable t)
Description copied from interface: SMTPResponseCallback
Method which will get executed if an Exception was thrown. Be Aware that the SMTPClientSession can be null if the Connection was not 100% established
